Summary: flashing red light high altitude moved very fast from far western sky to far east
divs: Sighting Detailslooking out my bedroom window clear night no planes in sight noticed flashing red light the size of a star hovering in far western sky. then it kind of bounces around a little and then steadies on a fast coarse to the far eastern sky in about 3-4 seconds no emission trail at all.i am experienced pilot this was not a common air vessel or airplane of any kind way to fast.
